name: Asimov Incident
description:
This dungeon crawling rogue-lite game will have you on the edge of your seats with its unforgiving game-play and randomly generated levels, giving the player a unique experience each time they play. Level your weapons as you kill your enemies and level yourself with their entrails to become the most powerful AI that you can be.

Developed by a team of 10 people at AIE we hope to receive feedback on our game and continue accordingly.
